message.name: ERR_DECISION_MATRIX_XRV_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A decision matrix with this Name already exists.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_MATRIX_VERSION_ALREADY_RELEASED
message.locale: This decision matrix has already been released.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_MATRIX_VERSION_INEDIT
message.locale: A new decision matrix version cannot be created because the latest version is In Edit. You must Release or Delete the latest version before creating a new version.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_MATRIX_VERSION_NOT_IN_INEDIT
message.locale: This version has been released and cannot be modified. To modify the decision matrix you must first create a new version.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_MATRIX_FOR_THIS_TYPE_EXISTS
message.locale: A decision matrix with this Type already exists for this determination package version.

message.name: ERR_DEL_DECISION_MATRIX_VERSION_ALREADY_RELEASED
message.locale: This decision matrix has already been released and therefore cannot be deleted. Only In Edit versions can be deleted.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_MATRIX_XRV_COMBINATION_INVALID
message.locale: Only one of either Cumulative Score or Scoring By Outcome can be selected for a Decision Matrix.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_MATRIX_MODIFY_COMBINATION_INVALID
message.locale: Scoring by Outcome cannot be selected as Cumulative Scoring has been selected.

message.name: ERR_DECISIONMATRIX_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_DECISIONMATRIX_ASSOCIATE_OUTCOME_SCORE_VALUE_COMBINATION_INVALID
message.locale: A Minimum or Maximum Score cannot be entered with a Value for a decision matrix.

message.name: ERR_DECISIONMATRIX_ASSOCIATE_OUTCOME_MIN_MAX_SCORE_COMBINATION_INVALID
message.locale: Maximum Score should be greater than the Minimum Score.

message.name: ERR_DECISIONMATRIX_ASSOCIATE_OUTCOME_INVALID
message.locale: Either the Cumulative score range or Value has to be specified.

message.name: ERR_DECISIONMATRIX_ASSOCIATE_OUTCOME_SCORE_EXISTS
message.locale: Minimum and Maximum values specified should be unique.

message.name: ERR_DECISIONMATRIX_ASSOCIATE_OUTCOME_VALUE_EXISTS
message.locale: An association with the same Value has been specified already for this decision matrix version.

message.name: ERR_DECISIONMATRIX_ASSOCIATE_OUTCOME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: This outcome has already been associated for this decision matrix version.

message.name: ERR_DECISIONMATRIX_ASSOCIATE_OUTCOME_SCORE_COMBINATION_INVALID
message.locale: The range defined overlaps with another cumulative score range for this decision matrix version.

message.name: ERR_DECISIONMATRIX_ASSOCIATE_OUTCOME_SCORE_VALUE_MUST_BE_INTEGER
message.locale: Value should be an Integer.

message.name: ERR_DECISIONMATRIX_ASSOCIATE_OUTCOME_SCORE_MIN_MAX_MUST_BE_INTEGER
message.locale: Minimum and Maximum Score should be an Integer.

message.name: ERR_DECISIONMATRIX_ASSOCIATE_OUTCOME_SCORE_MAX_BE_MUST_INTEGER
message.locale: Maximum Score should be an Integer.

message.name: ERR_DECISIONMATRIX_ASSOCIATE_OUTCOME_SCORE_MIN_MUST_BE_INTEGER
message.locale: Minimum Score should be an Integer.

message.name: ERR_DECISIONMATRIX_ASSOCIATE_OUTCOME_SCORE_MIN_MUST_BE_POSITIVE
message.locale: Minimum Score should be zero or greater.

message.name: ERR_DECISIONMATRIX_ASSOCIATE_OUTCOME_SCORE_MAX_MUST_BE_POSITIVE
message.locale: Maximum Score should be zero or greater.

message.name: ERR_DECISIONMATRIX_ASSOCIATE_OUTCOME_SCORE_VALUE_MUST_BE_POSITIVE
message.locale: Value should be zero or greater.

message.name: ERR_DECISIONMATRIX_TODATE_ALREADY_SET
message.locale: The decision matrix has already been removed.

message.name: ERR_DOM_EXCEPTION
message.locale: DOM exception has occurred.

message.name: ERR_IO_EXCEPTION
message.locale: I/O exception occurred while XML parsing.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_MATRIX_ASSOCIATE_OUTCOMES_SCORE_RANGE_OVERLAPS_WITH_VALUE
message.locale: The range specified overlaps with the Value %1d.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_MATRIX_ASSOCIATE_OUTCOMES_VALUE_OVERLAPS_WITH_SCORE_RANGE
message.locale: The Value specified overlaps with an already existing score range.
